Texts.Eng: Here you go, Captain. An Avikan Crafting Guide, and a blueprint for a truly unique weapon!

How would you like to learn more about Avikan crafting techniques? ^green;Gather special materials from a ^orange;Sandspitter^green;, ^orange;Sandcrawler^green;, ^orange;Stingwing Swarm^green;, and a ^orange;Valahr^white;, and I will give you an ^orange;Avikan Crafting Guide^white;, plus a ^orange;special blueprint ^white;for a weapon I'm working on.
